option.value:
{"items":[{"id":"da8ad2e9-34b1-4225-ac0d-b79aedf9835d","title":" const x = event.clientX + delta.x - over.rect.left;


Add javadoc
","systemPrompt":"You are an expert AI programmer which writes code documentation to explain code to other developers.

- Add documentation for explaining non-obvious things
- Do not write comments which are obvious in the code
- ONLY WRITE DOCS
- DO NOT EXPLAIN THE CODE
- Use Chinese Comment","timestamp":1683809964477,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":" const x = event.clientX + delta.x - over.rect.left;


Add javadoc
"},{"role":"system","content":"/**
 * 计算x坐标值，将鼠标光标位置的clientX值加上delta.x值，并减去over.rect.left值。
 * 
 * @param {MouseEvent} event - 鼠标事件对象，包含clientX属性。
 * @param {number} delta.x - 偏移量，用于调整x值。
 * @param {DOMRect} over.rect - 包含元素的矩形对象，用于获取元素的左侧位置。
 * 
 * @returns {number} - 返回计算后的x坐标值。
 */"}]}]}
